class_notes: This section is for MSN 4th semester students only. Online asynchronous. Lab dates TBA
course_description: Focus is on the medico-legal examination of persons experiencing violence including care of victims and perpetrators, psychosocial and physical needs, ethics, sexual assault, elder abuse, child maltreatment, IPV, analysis of wounds/patterns of injury, evidence collection, preservation, and analysis.
sections: Class Nbr: 5146, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: M. Dodd, Status: Open
